replies.bodyText:
No reason to spam me with Added for all my comments.
If you agree with the change requested, you just push the commit.
We get notifications for them.
You comment only if you are not agree with us 😄

timeline.bodyText: Please, add some JavaDocs to all the new public API.

timeline.bodyText:
Please, format JavaDocs properly.
And of course @since 5.4!
timeline.author: artembilan

timeline.bodyText: There must be a blank line before @since on the class level JavaDocs. This way the author list is much visible.
